title: Lvl 2 Spells
content: escription Classes Shadow Blade Illusion Bonus Action Level 2 Spell Slot Concentration Weave a shadowy shortsword in your hand that deals 2~16 Psychic damage. When you use the sword to attack a target that is in dim light or darkness, you make the Attack Roll with Advantage. The shadow blade can be unequipped and equipped again, but must remain on the spellcaster's person.
